Interactive District Map

Citywide Mayor and At-Large positions are shown below. Click on a La Porte City Council District on the map below to find district representation. (For a full-screen version of the map, view the map on our GIS platform.)


To email the entire Council as a group, use LPCityCouncil@LaPorteTX.gov. For individual Councilmembers, visit our Mayor & Council webpage.
